meanings.sent1: Her uninhibitednesses at the party surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: His uninhibitednesses in dancing showed his carefree nature.
meanings.sent3: The cat's uninhibitednesses in chasing its tail entertained the children.
meanings.sent4: The artist's uninhibitednesses in painting created vibrant masterpieces.
meanings.sent5: The uninhibitednesses of the waterfall was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being uninhibited
meanings.sent1: The uninhibitednesses of her laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent2: His uninhibitednesses in conversation made him a great storyteller.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's uninhibitednesses in playing made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The uninhibitednesses of the ocean waves was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The uninhibitednesses of the children's laughter echoed in the park.

meanings.definition: Freedom from social constraints or inhibitions
meanings.sent1: The party provided an atmosphere of uninhibitednesses for all guests.
meanings.sent2: Her uninhibitednesses allowed her to express herself freely.
meanings.sent3: The uninhibitednesses of the comedy show had the audience roaring with laughter.
meanings.sent4: The uninhibitednesses of the forest animals in their natural habitat was a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent5: The uninhibitednesses of the dancers on stage captivated the audience.
